name: io.github.yakub268/kalshi
description: MCP server for Kalshi prediction markets - search, analyze, and trade prediction markets through Claude Desktop
longDescription: Production-grade MCP server enabling Claude Desktop to interact with Kalshi prediction markets. Features include market search, orderbook analysis, portfolio management, and order execution. Built with battle-tested authentication and rate limiting from a live trading system with 4+ months uptime.
author: yakub268

tools.name: search_markets
tools.description: Search Kalshi prediction markets by keyword with prices and volume

tools.name: get_market_details
tools.description: Get full market details including orderbook depth

tools.name: get_portfolio
tools.description: Get account balance and open positions with P&L

tools.name: get_trending_markets
tools.description: Get top trending markets by 24-hour volume

tools.name: place_order
tools.description: Execute limit orders on Kalshi markets

tools.name: get_series_markets
tools.description: Get all markets in a series (e.g., all Fed events)
